long_description: Rely on the expert fit and performance fabric of the women's Strider Shorts from Patagonia to enhance your comfort on the run. Quick-drying, stretchy outer fabric provides air circulation and wicks moisture to keep you comfortable; fabric is half recycled. Fabric features a durable water repellent finish that causes light moisture to bead up and roll off. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying liner briefs offer a comfortable fit without being too tight, and feature a permanent treatment to ward off funky smells. Internal drop-in pocket at back hip stores a key or card; reflective logo improves visibility. Elastic drawcord waist personalizes fit; Patagonia Strider Shorts for women offer a regular fit that won't bind or chafe.
short_description: Rely on the expert fit and performance fabric of the women's Strider Shorts from Patagonia to enhance your comfort on the run.
